ingredients: 2  avocados - peeled, pitted and diced, 1  sweet onion, chopped, 1  green bell pepper, chopped, 1 large ripe tomato, chopped,   +   1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro,   +   1/2  lime, juiced,   salt and pepper to taste
nutrition: Total Fat 10g 13%, Saturated Fat 2g 8%, Sodium 9mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 10g 4%, Dietary Fiber 6g 20%, Total Sugars 3g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 30mg 150%, Calcium 20mg 2%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 474mg 10%
